1141020.name: Adventure Escape Mysteries
1141020.description:
Play a story-driven room escape game with unique puzzles enjoyed by tens of millions of players. Solve mysteries, puzzle through escape rooms, and find the clue that will crack the case in a critically acclaimed puzzle adventure game!

PLAY AN EPIC STORY

Save a fantasy kingdom in Legend of the Sacred Stones! A mysterious curse has fallen over Tempus Island. Help Aila take control of the elements and learn the truth about her past as she battles towering Stone Gods in this epic adventure!

SOLVE A MURDER MYSTERY

Find clues and solve a murder mystery as Detective Kate Gray in On Thin Ice! A mysterious criminal has blackmailed the police station and a key witness was murdered. Investigate the crime scene, interrogate suspects, and solve the case.

SURVIVE THE HORROR

Julian Torres is an ordinary boy in the sleepy town of Ardenville. But for whatever reason, a creepy serial killer known as Mirror Man keeps trying to kill Julian. Who is Mirror Man? What can stop him? Can you help Julian survive?

SOLVE UNIQUE PUZZLES

Train your mind. Use your observation skills, deductive reasoning, and cunning to solve our puzzles and find hidden objects. Collect treasures and tools in your inventory, find clues, and enjoy a brilliant escape room experience from the comfort of your mobile device.

INSPIRED BY CLASSIC POINT AND CLICK GAMES

Adventure Escape takes the best of classic point and click adventure games that adults love and mixes it with the brain teasing gameplay of modern escape games.

SUPPORT AN INDIE COMPANY

We're an indie game studio that loves making games and puzzles. Our team has been to hundreds of escape rooms and participated in jigsaw puzzle competitions. At Haiku, we have a game design philosophy we call “satisfying challenge.” We think puzzles should be tough but solvable, so we spend a lot of time designing unique puzzles that we think you'll love!

KEY FEATURES

  • The most ingenious escape room gameplay. Investigate the environment and interpret clues to solve the puzzles!

  • Explore 500+ beautifully illustrated scenes

  • Play unique puzzles that delight the mind

  • Regularly updated with more fun stories!

  • Save your progress so you can play on multiple devices!

  • More stories to come!

Third Party Account

We use a 3rd party account from a provider called Playfab. The account is not required to play the game, but players who are signed in can also sync their progress with their mobile device.
1141020.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 日语, 韩语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 繁体中文
